title: Don't Breathe
actors: Stephen Lang, Jane Levy, Dylan Minnette, Daniel Zovatto
plot: Rocky, a young woman wanting to start a better life for her and her sister, agrees to take part in the robbery of a house owned by a wealthy blind man with her boyfriend Money and their friend Alex. But when the blind man turns out to be a more than he seems, the group must find a way to escape his home before they become his newest victims.
